Song.title: Take My Life (Fluharty)
Song.copyright: Frances Ridley Havergal | Henri Abraham Cesar Malan Â© Public Domain. Alt. Lyrics by Tom Fluharty

Arrangement.text:
Chorus: Take my [E]life, Lord, let it [F#m]be Conse[E/G#]crated, Lord, to The[A]e, for The[B]e, Lord Take my [E]life, Lord, let it [F#m]be Conse[E/G#]crated, Lord, to The[A]e, for The[B]e, Lord [F#m]Let [E/G#]it fl[A]ow, [F#m]ov[E/G#]erfl[A]ow, [F#m]Ov[E/G#]erfl[A]ow in c[Bsus]ease[B]less pr[E]aise
Verse 1: [E]Take my life and [A/C#]let [B]it [E]be [C#m]Conse[F#m]crated [Bsus]Lord [B]to T[Ehee [E]Take my m[B]oments [A]and [Bmy [Esus E]days [E]Let them [A]flow in c[F#m]easeless p[Bsus]raise [F#m]Let [E/G#]them fl[A]ow in c[Bsus]ease[B]less pr[E]aise [Esus E]
Verse 2: Take my hands and let them move At the impulse of Thy love Take my feet and let them be Swift and beautiful for Thee Swift and beautiful for Thee
Verse 3: Take my voice and let me sing Always only for my King Take my lips and let them be Filled with messages from Thee Filled with messages from Thee
{new_page} Chorus: Take my [E]life, Lord, let it [F#m]be Conse[E/G#]crated, Lord, to The[A]e, for The[B]e, Lord Take my [E]life, Lord, let it [F#m]be Conse[E/G#]crated, Lord, to The[A]e, for The[B]e, Lord [F#m]Let [E/G#]it fl[A]ow, [F#m]ov[E/G#]erfl[A]ow, [F#m]Ov[E/G#]erfl[A]ow in c[Bsus]ease[B]less pr[E]aise
Verse 4: Take my silver and my gold Not a mite would I withhold Take my intellect and use Ev'ry pow'r as Thou shalt choose Ev'ry pow'r as Thou shalt choose
Verse 5: Take my will and make it Thine It shall be no longer mine Take my heart it is Thine own It shall be Thy royal throne It shall be Thy royal throne
Verse 6: Take my love my Lord I pour At Thy feet its treasure store Take myself and I will be Ever only all for Thee Ever only all for Thee
Arrangement.searchtext: chorus take my life lord let it be consecrated lord to thee for thee lord take my life lord let it be consecrated lord to thee for thee lord let it flow overflow overflow in ceaseless praise verse 1 take my life and let it be consecrated lord to tehee take my moments and bmy days let them flow in ceaseless praise let them flow in ceaseless praise verse 2 take my hands and let them move at the impulse of thy love take my feet and let them be swift and beautiful for thee swift and beautiful for thee verse 3 take my voice and let me sing always only for my king take my lips and let them be filled with messages from thee filled with messages from thee chorus take my life lord let it be consecrated lord to thee for thee lord take my life lord let it be consecrated lord to thee for thee lord let it flow overflow overflow in ceaseless praise verse 4 take my silver and my gold not a mite would i withhold take my intellect and use evry powr as thou shalt choose evry powr as thou shalt choose verse 5 take my will and make it thine it shall be no longer mine take my heart it is thine own it shall be thy royal throne it shall be thy royal throne verse 6 take my love my lord i pour at thy feet its treasure store take myself and i will be ever only all for thee ever only all for thee
